postReview.title: Brentford 3-1 Newcastle United: Igor Thiago firma un doblete en la remontada de la segunda parte
postReview.description: El Newcastle United acumula ya nueve salidas sin ganar en la Premier League después de que el Brentford remontara para imponerse 3-1 al conjunto de Eddie Howe.

postReview.title: Brentford 3-1 Newcastle United: Thiago scores brace in second-half turnaround
postReview.description: Newcastle United are now without a win in nine Premier League away matches as Brentford came from behind to beat Eddie Howe's side 3-1.

postReview.title: Brentford 3-1 Newcastle United: Igor Thiago firma una doppietta nella rimonta nel secondo tempo
postReview.description: Il Newcastle United non vince da nove trasferte di Premier League: il Brentford è andato sotto e ha rimontato fino al 3-1 contro la squadra di Eddie Howe.

postReview.title: Brentford 3 a 1 Newcastle United: Igor Thiago marca dois em virada no segundo tempo
postReview.description: O Newcastle United chegou a nove partidas sem vencer fora de casa na Premier League, com o Brentford virando para derrotar o time de Eddie Howe por 3 a 1.

postReview.title: Brentford 3-1 Newcastle United : Igor Thiago signe un doublé lors de la remontée en seconde période
postReview.description: Newcastle United reste sur neuf matches de Premier League à l'extérieur sans victoire, Brentford ayant renversé la situation pour s'imposer 3-1 face à l'équipe d'Eddie Howe.

postReview.title: Brentford 3:1 Newcastle United: Thiago schnürt Doppelpack bei Wende nach der Pause
postReview.description: Newcastle United wartet nun seit neun Premier-League-Auswärtsspielen auf einen Sieg, nachdem Brentford die Partie drehte und Eddie Howes Team mit 3:1 schlug.

postReview.title: برينتفورد 3-1 نيوكاسل يونايتد: تياغو يوقع على ثنائية في انتفاضة الشوط الثاني
postReview.description: لم يحقق نيوكاسل يونايتد أي فوز في آخر تسع مباريات خارج ملعبه في الدوري الإنجليزي الممتاز، بعدما قلب برينتفورد الطاولة وفاز 3-1 على فريق إدي هاو.

postReview.title: Brentford 3-1 Newcastle United: Igor Thiago bisou na reviravolta da segunda parte
postReview.description: O Newcastle United leva agora nove jogos sem vencer fora na Premier League, após o Brentford virar para 3-1 frente à equipa de Eddie Howe.

preReview.title: Andrews relieved as Brentford escape Wissa return with Newcastle
preReview.description: Yoanne Wissa will not feature for his new club Newcastle United when they visit his former employers at Brentford on Sunday.

preReview.title: Alivio para Andrews al escapar del regreso de Wissa con el Newcastle
preReview.description: Yoanne Wissa no jugará para su nuevo club, el Newcastle United, cuando visiten a su antiguo equipo, el Brentford, el domingo.

preReview.title: Andrews sollevato mentre Brentford supera il ritorno di Wissa col Newcastle
preReview.description: Yoanne Wissa non sarà presente per il suo nuovo club Newcastle United quando visiteranno il suo ex datore di lavoro al Brentford domenica.

preReview.title: Andrews aliviado enquanto Brentford escapa do retorno de Wissa contra Newcastle
preReview.description: Yoanne Wissa não jogará por seu novo time Newcastle United quando visitarem seu antigo clube Brentford no domingo.

preReview.title: Andrews soulagé alors que Brentford échappe à un retour de Wissa avec Newcastle
preReview.description: Yoanne Wissa ne figurera pas pour son nouveau club Newcastle United lorsqu'ils visiteront son ancien employeur à Brentford dimanche.

preReview.title: Erleichterung bei Andrews, da Brentford Wissa-Rückkehr gegen Newcastle entgeht
preReview.description: Yoanne Wissa wird für seinen neuen Klub Newcastle United nicht antreten, wenn sie am Sonntag seine ehemaligen Arbeitgeber bei Brentford besuchen.

preReview.title: أندروز يشعر بالارتياح بعد أن نجا برينتفورد من عودة ويسا لمواجهة نيوكاسل
preReview.description: لن يشارك يوان ويسا مع ناديه الجديد نيوكاسل يونايتد عندما يزور فريقه السابق برينتفورد يوم الأحد.

preReview.title: Andrews aliviado com ausência de Wissa na visita do Newcastle ao Brentford
preReview.description: Yoanne Wissa não estará presente no seu novo clube Newcastle United quando eles visitarem seu antigo time, o Brentford, no domingo.

QAData.question: Who won between Brentford and Newcastle United on Sun, 09 Nov 2025 14:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brentford won 3–1 over Newcastle United on Sun, 09 Nov 2025 14:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Daniel Burn committed a foul leading to a penalty for Brentford.
Mikkel Damsgaard created the most chances (3) in the match.
Sven Botman completed the most passes (53) in the match.
Jacob Ramsey is the most accurate passer (93%) in the match.
Kevin Schade is the most fouled player in the match (4 times).
Nick Woltemade has the least touches (30) of any outfield player.
Igor Thiago was Player of the Match with a rating of 9.1.
Michael Kayode completed the most dribbles (3) in the match.
